headline: Galapagos Receives Transparency Notifications from Bank of America
summary: Mechelen, Belgium; February 10, 2026, 22:01 CET; regulated information – Galapagos NV (Euronext & NASDAQ: GLPG) received transparency notifications from Bank of America. Pursuant to Belgian transparency legislation1, Galapagos received transparency notifications on February 5, 6, and 9, 2026, from Bank of America Corporation. The initial notification indicates that Bank of America Corporation, as controlling entity, crossed above the threshold of 5% of Galapagos’ voting rights on February 2, 202

raw.headline: Galapagos Receives Transparency Notifications from Bank of America
raw.summary: Mechelen, Belgium; February 10, 2026, 22:01 CET; regulated information – Galapagos NV (Euronext & NASDAQ: GLPG) received transparency notifications from Bank of America. Pursuant to Belgian transparency legislation1, Galapagos received transparency notifications on February 5, 6, and 9, 2026, from Bank of America Corporation. The initial notification indicates that Bank of America Corporation, as controlling entity, crossed above the threshold of 5% of Galapagos’ voting rights on February 2, 202

headline: This name is ’digitalizing global money movement’, BofA says and initiates at Buy
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America initiated coverage of one money transfer company’s stock with a Buy rating, describing it as “digitalizing global money movement” and highlighting what it sees as a multi-year expansion opportunity.

headline: 539 Merrill Advisors Recognized on Forbes' Top Women Wealth Advisor Lists
summary: Forbes recognized 539 Merrill Wealth Management and Merrill Private Wealth Advisors on its annual Top Women Wealth Advisors Best-in-State, more than any other firm. The strong showing includes 17 advisors who ranked number one in their states, underscoring the depth and geographic breadth of Merrill's advisor talent. (Rankings published February 4, 2026 based on data as of June 30, 2025.)

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Bank Of America (BAC) After Its Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether Bank of America is still good value at today’s price, or if most of the opportunity is already reflected in the share price, this article walks through what the current market tag might really mean for you. The stock last closed at US$56.41, with returns of 4.4% over the past 7 days, 1.0% over 30 days, 0.8% year to date, 23.7% over 1 year, 71.2% over 3 years and 90.7% over 5 years. This gives useful context before comparing the price to fundamentals. Recent...
